Introduction

Chaehyun is a South Korean singer and dancer under WAKEONE. In 2021, Chaehyun participated in the MNET survival show Girls Planet 999 where she finished 1st place, securing her spot as a member of the South Korean project girl group Kep1er.

Chaehyun debuted as a member of Kep1er on January 3, 2022, with their first mini-album "First Impact" and the title track "WA DA DA."

Chaehyun considers her specialties to be singing, DIY, and speaking Japanese.

2
Chaehyun has tons of hobbies, including photography, gaming, watching YouTube videos, and playing the guitar.

Chaehyun was very popular for her looks at school, people even gathered in hallways to see her.
